metadata.Title: CVE-2018-16842 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
Curl versions 7.14.1 through 7.61.1 are vulnerable to a heap-based bufferover-read in the tool_msgs.c:voutf() function that may result ininformation exposure and denial of service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-16842` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

curl - 7.35.0-1ubuntu2.19
libcurl3 - 7.35.0-1ubuntu2.19
libcurl3-gnutls - 7.35.0-1ubuntu2.19
libcurl3-nss - 7.35.0-1ubuntu2.19
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: curl package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.35.0-1ubuntu2.19').
